reactor.tcp.encoding.json

Class JsonCodec<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.tcp.encoding.json.JsonCodec<IN,OUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    IN - The type to decode JSON into
    OUT - The type to encode into JSON
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec<reactor.io.Buffer,IN,OUT>

    public class JsonCodec<IN,OUT>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Codec<reactor.io.Buffer,IN,OUT>
    A codec for decoding JSON into Java objects and encoding Java objects into JSON.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsonCodec(java.lang.Class<IN> inputType)
      Creates a new JsonCodec that will create instances of inputType when decoding.
      JsonCodec(java.lang.Class<IN> inputType, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.Module customModule)
      Creates a new JsonCodec that will create instances of inputType when decoding.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      reactor.function.Function<reactor.io.Buffer,IN> decoder(reactor.function.Consumer<IN> next)
      Provide the caller with a decoder to turn a source object into an instance of the input type.
      reactor.function.Function<OUT,reactor.io.Buffer> encoder()
      Provide the caller with an encoder to turn an output object into an instance of the source type.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JsonCodec

        public JsonCodec(java.lang.Class<IN> inputType)
        Creates a new JsonCodec that will create instances of inputType when decoding.
        Parameters:
        inputType - The type to create when decoding.

      • JsonCodec

        public JsonCodec(java.lang.Class<IN> inputType,
         com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.Module customModule)
        Creates a new JsonCodec that will create instances of inputType when decoding. The customModule will be registered with the underlying ObjectMapper.
        Parameters:
        inputType - The type to create when decoding.
        customModule - The module to register with the underlying ObjectMapper
